name: gRPC / Protobuf Adapter
content:
# gRPC / Protobuf Adapter

**Design**
- proto3 style (names, packages, field numbering). Choose unary vs streaming deliberately; require deadlines/timeouts on RPCs.

**Versioning**
- Prefer additive changes; reserve fields; deprecate rather than repurpose; bump package/version for breaking changes.

**Runbook**
```
# Generate stubs for the project's languages (example: Go)
protoc --proto_path=. --go_out=. --go-grpc_out=. path/to/*.proto
```

**Performance**
- Follow gRPC performance best practices (connection pooling, message sizes, compression when appropriate).

**References**
- Protocol Buffers — https://protobuf.dev/
- gRPC — https://grpc.io/docs/
- API Design Guide — https://cloud.google.com/apis/design
